resources:
Epay Epay Logo
Epay
Create your account to get started. Mobile No. Email ID Password Sign up Already have an account? > Login
Login Don't have an account? Sign up Epay is a simple, simulated digital wallet application designed to help you manage your money, perform transactions, and pay bills easily. Our goal is to provide a user-friendly and engaging experience that mirrors popular payment apps. • User Authentication (Login And Sign up)
 • Digital Wallet Management
 • Mobile Recharge And Bill Payments
 • Secure Transaction History
 • Interactive Offers And Rewards This application was developed as a project to demonstrate the core functionalities of a modern digital wallet. It's a comprehensive example of modular app design, focusing on simplicity and user engagement.
